security: Dissemination of information about Anatoliy Mikhaylovich GOLITSYN requires coordination with C/SB/CI/P, indicating the sensitivity of the information. The report discusses the defector Anatoliy GOLITSYN and K.G.B. beliefs about his and NOSEIKO's visits to England, which could compromise intelligence sources and methods. It says, "Any further dissemination must be coordinated with C/SB/CI/P."
summary: This report addresses requirements based on SBSR-547 regarding Anatoliy Mikhaylovich GOLITSYN, specifically clarifying information about his wife, instructions, and KGB beliefs about his and Yuriy Ivanovich NOSEIKO’s alleged visits to England.
summary_one_paragraph: Dated February 23, 1973, this CI Information Report, referenced as SBSR-843, clarifies details pertaining to Anatoliy Mikhaylovich GOLITSYN based on previous report SBSR-547. Sourced from AESMASH, the report addresses discrepancies and provides further information on GOLITSYN’s interactions and K.G.B. perceptions, particularly regarding instructions GOLITSYN received and whether either GOLITSYN or Yuriy Ivanovich NOSEIKO had visited England after their defections, requiring any dissemination to be coordinated with C/SB/CI/P.
title: Anatoliy Mikhaylovich GOLITSYN
